Deprettere Telephone +31 71 527 4799 E-mail e.f.a.deprettere@liacs.leidenuniv.nl News 05 July 2022 Fifteen year old paper receives international award 11 October 2012 Handbook of Signal Processing Systems Former PhD candidates Ana Balevic Mohamed Ahmed Mohamed Bamakhrama Emanuele Cannella Sven van Haastrecht Sjoerd Meijer Dmitri Nadezhkin Hristo Nikolov Jiali Zhai Professor emeritus of Information technology Faculty of Science Leiden Inst of Advanced Computer Science Work address Gorlaeus Building Einsteinweg 55 2333 CC Leiden Contact +31 71 527 4799 e.f.a.deprettere@liacs.leidenuniv.nl JavaScript is required to view this content.
